name: pingpongfy-doc
description: ## Introduction PingPongfy is an open source project to manage your ping pong tables at work.  Isn't a waste time waiting for your turn to play?  With Pingpongfy not only you will know in real-time the state of the table  but also you will get notifications when table is free. Pingpongfy is **in development** right now.
author: vicente-valls
